rules_text:
Menace, trample, lifelink
At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player loses life equal to the number of artifacts they don't control. Then if each player has 5 or more life, Yawgmoth, Father of Machines becomes an artifact until end of turn.
notes:
!exportname Yawgmoth Father of Machines (bundle promo)
